parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To feel compassion, have pity on, be moved.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To stretch out (forth), cast forth (as of an anchor), lay hands on. From ek and teino; to extend.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Prop: I fasten to; I lay hold of, touch, know carnally. Reflexive of hapto; properly, to attach oneself to, i.e. To touch.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To cleanse, make clean, literally, ceremonially, or spiritually, according to context. From katharos; to cleanse.
